name: ColorSense
description:
Explore a beautiful and immersive open world, unlocking the ability to see it's colors and making it come to life.

Each color gives you a different special power, which you can use to advance through a series of engaging and thought provoking puzzles, each one solvable in a number of different ways, using creativity and skill.

Combining powers can lead to countless unique ways to traverse through the world, while some areas can only be reached by experimenting and exploring hidden paths.

You can load your game by pressing escape while playing and clicking the load button in the pause menu.
